articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Maxwell verdict puts fresh pressure on Prince Andrew - Eyewitness News
articles.description: The Duke of York, the second son of Elizabeth II and ninth in line to the throne, has long-standing ties to Maxwell, who has been found guilty of recruiting and grooming young girls to be sexually abused by the late American financier Jeffrey Epstein.
